Aug. 17, 2002 D Solothurn Marching-Parade
Solothurn Marching Parade 0 March Contest
solothurn-marching-parade
None
Solothurn (City&District), Switzerland This Mixed-Contest started in 2002 with the Idea to bring different Bands (BB/Wind/Youth/Fanfare/Military/Drums&Pipes etc.) together and present an audience-oriented 'Marching Parade'. The presented Pieces include Marching, Show Elements and other Music Styles. Adjucators look for Music, Originality and lots of Entertainment!
2002 TOP3: 1. Musikverein Bubendorf/BL 2. Nobody's Brass (heute Brass Band Emmental/BE) 3. Harmoniemusik Buchs/AG
also participated: Batterie-Fanfare L‘Audacieuse Bienne/BE Feldmusik Hochdorf/LU Musikgesellschaft Harmonie Büsserach/SO
no Contest: Berittene Artilleriemusik Solothurn BAMS
